title: ICE using Palantir tool that feeds on Medicaid data
author: JKCalhoun
aiHeadline: ICE's latest scheme: using Palantir to mine Medicaid data for fun and profit, because nothing says 'Big Brother' like healthcare surveillance.

title: A flawed paper in management science has been cited more than 6k times
author: timr
aiHeadline: A management paper so flawed it's been cited 6,000 times: because nothing says 'academic rigor' like repeating the same mistakes over and over again.

title: Deutsche Telekom is throttling the internet
author: tietjens
aiHeadline: Deutsche Telekom throttles the internet, proving once again that when you're a giant telecom, 'throttling' is just a fancy word for 'slowing down your competition.'

title: A macOS app that blurs your screen when you slouch
author: dnw
aiHeadline: A macOS app that blurs your screen when you slouch: because your computer now thinks it's your mom, nagging you about your posture.

title: Yes, It's Fascism
author: mickle00
aiHeadline: Yes, it's fascism: because apparently, the only thing more dangerous than a fascist regime is a fascist regime that thinks it's not fascist.
